# Changelog

All notable changes to `ng2-input-mask` will be documented in this file

## 0.0.7 - 2017-01-15

- Change name masks:
	date: brDate
	time: brTime
	dateTime: brDateTime
	landlinePhone: brLandlinePhone
	cellPhone: brCellPhone
	phoneUs: UsPhone

## 0.0.2 ~ 0.0.6

- Tests

## 0.0.1 - 2017-01-10

- Initial release
